projects.title: Mesh Mind
projects.description: A multi-model chat interface that coordinates multiple AI models in a single conversation, running a 'research and debate' process to synthesize a final, concise answer.
projects.longDescription: Mesh Mind showcases advanced AI orchestration using Convex workflows. Users select a 'master' model and secondary models which then engage in a two-round process: parallel initial responses followed by a debate round where each model refines its answer based on its peers. The final output is a synthesized summary. The app features real-time streaming, file-based grounding for prompts, and a lightweight subscription and usage-tracking model.

projects.title: Atlas Outbound
projects.tagline: AI-Powered Sales Calls - Hackathon Winner ($10k Prize)
projects.description: Award-winning AI platform that automates sales prospecting for agencies by finding qualified local clients and initiating trust-based AI sales calls to book discovery meetings.
projects.longDescription: Atlas Outbound won 1st place at the Convex Modern Stack Hackathon, earning a $10k cash prize plus ~$3k in additional prizes. Built in just 12 days, it solves a critical agency pain point by combining intelligent lead sourcing with AI-powered sales automation. The platform uses Google Places API for lead discovery, Firecrawl to analyze websites for marketing gaps, and OpenAI for intelligence. Its standout feature is a context-aware AI sales agent powered by Vapi, which leverages the agency's own case studies to build immediate trust and book qualified discovery calls. The real-time dashboard, powered by Convex, showcases a complete end-to-end user flow from prospecting to conversion.

projects.title: Civicly
projects.description: A real-time data engine that ingests and processes U.S. congressional bills, using AI to provide summaries, semantic search, and chat-based analysis for complex legislative information.
projects.longDescription: Civicly's core is a fully implemented data pipeline built on Convex. It uses cron jobs to discover new bill manifests from govinfo.gov, processes XML files, and enriches the data with AI-generated summaries and categorizations from GPT-4o. The data is then vectorized for advanced semantic search (RAG), allowing users to interact with and understand complex legislation through a simple chat interface.

projects.title: FoodTruckFlow
projects.tagline: A Full-Stack B2B Multi-Tenant SaaS Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive SaaS platform that empowers food truck owners to create professional websites with integrated online ordering, featuring a sophisticated multi-tenant architecture.
projects.longDescription: FoodTruckFlow is a complete digital solution for mobile food businesses. Its multi-tenant architecture uses Supabase's Row-Level Security (RLS) for complete data isolation between tenants. The platform handles automatic subdomain generation, custom domain mapping via Vercel, and a JSON-based configuration for a live, real-time website builder. It also features a full subscription system with Stripe, including freemium and pro tiers with recurring billing.

projects.title: TeachMagic
projects.description: An AI platform for educators that instantly generates structured slides, quizzes, and custom images on any subject using OpenAI and Stability AI, with seamless export capabilities.
projects.longDescription: TeachMagic leverages OpenAI's GPT-4o for structured content generation and Stability AI for creating contextually relevant images. The backend uses Drizzle ORM with a PostgreSQL database, optimized with a memory caching layer. The platform is secured with Clerk Authentication and processes payments via Stripe, providing a robust, enterprise-ready solution for modern educational content creation.
